Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2013 05:39PM Rdhnow wrote: Heather214, it is called Levsin! I was also having spasms in my esophagus which are due to acid reflux from the chemo, one of these pills dissolved under my tongue worked within minutes! It is so much better today! How many more treatments do you have and when is your next one?

Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2013 02:32PM Rdhnow wrote: Heather214, I am beginning to think it is common to have this cramping issue.
